thread.title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion

title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion
text:
High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion 10:30am IST - 01:23 
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion was hailed as hero, investigators Wednesday focused on the engine explosion and airlines around the world rushed to inspect the safety of their fleets. Conway G. Gittens reports.
